entity.description: Robert Swan Mueller III is an American attorney who served as the sixth Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation from 2001 to 2013.

text: @funder Trump escape the Mueller Investigation he escaped the Impeachment Investigation but he will not be able to escape this no response slow response to the Coronavirus crisis see you in November.
